alert.note: Alert for Gunnison Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued May 25 at 1:21PM MDT until May 27 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND DRY FUELS FOR COLORADO FIRE WEATHER ZONES 207, 290, 291, 292, 293 BELOW 9500 FEET, 294, 295, AS WELL AS UTAH FIRE WEATHER ZONE 490... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND DRY FUELS FOR COLORADO FIRE WEATHER ZONES 207, 290, 291, 292, 293 BELOW 9500 FEET, 294, 295, AS WELL AS UTAH FIRE WEATHER ZONE 490... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 293 BELOW 9500 FEET... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 293 BELOW 9500 FEET... The National Weather Service in Grand Junction has issued a Fire Weather Watch below 9500 feet for gusty winds, low relative humidity and dry fuels, which is in effect from Friday morning through Friday evening. A Fire Weather Watch has also been issued from Saturday morning through Saturday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...In Colorado, Fire Weather Zone 293 Gunnison Basin Forecast Area below 9500 feet. * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...10 to 15 percent. * IMPACTS...
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
